content: minerva is a 12 30 5 cm granny square with a center set on point this pattern is part of the third edition of granny square month 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in row crocheting in rounds increasing crocheting in chain spaces crocheting around the side of row includes video tutorials crocheting in the back loop includes link to video tutorial special stitch patterns bob cluster fpsc puff includes written instructions and video tutorials in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult 49 124 5 cm wingspan x 20 51 cm spine **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *or approximately 52 yd 47 5 m in ca 60 yd 55 m in cb and 41 yd 37 5 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle **gauge** through round 6 in pattern = 5 13 cm square *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern* 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/01/granny-square-month-is-back/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/19/minerva-granny-square-crochet-pattern/
